characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings,  Words of Radiance (mentioned)

characterDescription: Niter was a low-ranking lighteyes, yet the head of the Cobalt Guard. He had a black beard and was very suspicious of anyone who tried to get close to Dalinar or any member of House Kholin. Zahel considered him to be a good man and a friend. He died keeping the men of House Kholin alive.
